name: Battle for the Galaxy
storyline: Players are offered to create or join corporations (groups of up to fifty people), which provide them with permanent bonuses to make defensive and offensive gameplay of a player easier and allow him to participate in a corporate war.
summary: Battle for the Galaxy features player-controlled development of the space outpost, further defending that outpost from other players, as well as attacking outposts of other players. Resources for army training and base development are obtained either from attacks, or via mines daily production.
